metadata.title: CVE-2018-1002105 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In all Kubernetes versions prior to v1.10.11, v1.11.5, and v1.12.3,incorrect handling of error responses to proxied upgrade requests in thekube-apiserver allowed specially crafted requests to establish a connectionthrough the Kubernetes API server to backend servers, then send arbitraryrequests over the same connection directly to the backend, authenticatedwith the Kubernetes API server's TLS credentials used to establish thebackend connection.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
